name: The Sage
description:
Adds a new character, The Sage (72 cards, 6 relics, 1 potion).
Adds Upgraded potions to the game.
Character neutral content: 3 colorless cards, 6 relics, 1 potion, 1 event.

A mechanic who studied about the cult of a blue bird. She learned flying a carpet and brewing potions in order to stop its rise.

Supported Languages: ENG, DEU.
